actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to convey certain property to Sunnyside Valley Irrigation District.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey to Sunnyside Valley Irrigation District of Sunnyside, Washington, without consideration, all U.S. right, title, and interest, excluding oil, gas, and other mineral deposits, in specified lands in Sunnyside, Washington.

titles.title: A bill to convey certain property to Sunnyside Valley Irrigation District.
